name: Family Connections Donations
description: Accepts donations of baby and child-related items including strollers, toys, books, and clothing; serves families with young children
fullDescription: Family Connections accepts donations of baby and child-related items to support their programs serving families with young children in San Mateo County.
whatTheyOffer:
- Accept baby item donations
- Accept strollers and car seats
- Accept toys and books
- Accept children's clothing
- Serves families with young children
- Items distributed to families in need
howToGetIt:
1. Check accepted items list
2. Gather baby/child items to donate
3. Contact Family Connections
4. Drop off at donation location
5. Items go to families in need
6. Get donation receipt
address: 109 S. Claremont Street, San Mateo, CA 94401
